basic_information.scholarship_name: John Tipsword II CPT, USA (Ret.) Endowed Scholarship in Political Science
basic_information.scholarship_notes: will get the fund balance from Erin

description: This scholarship was established by UCO Alumnus John Tipsword whose education was paid for by the United States Army while attending UCO. As the only college graduate in his family, he feels grateful for having the opportunity to attend and would like to pay it forward. This scholarship recognizes a Political Science student who demonstrates strong academic performance and financial need. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Political Science major Full-time student Minimum 2.5 GPA Preference is given to a student serving in the Army National Guard Faculty recommendation letter

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
